trans-unit.source: Pipes are a great way to encapsulate and share common display-value transformations. Use them like styles, dropping them into your template's expressions to enrich the appeal and usability of your views.
trans-unit.target: Pipes是封装和共享常见的显示值转换的好方法。像使用样式一样使用它们,将它们放入模板的表达式中,以丰富视图的吸引力和可用性。

trans-unit.source: Pipes are easy to test without the Angular testing utilities.
trans-unit.target: 在没有Angular测试工具的情况下,管道很容易测试。

trans-unit.source: Pipes are simple functions that accept an input value and return a transformed value. They're easy to apply within template expressions, using the pipe operator (|):
trans-unit.target: 管道是简单的函数，它们接受输入值并返回转换后的值。使用管道运算符（ | ），很容易在模板表达式中应用它们：

trans-unit.source: Previously, the parent HeroesComponent set the HeroDetailComponent.hero property and the HeroDetailComponent displayed the hero.
trans-unit.target: 以前，父 HeroesComponent 设置了 HeroDetailComponent.hero 属性，并且 HeroDetailComponent 显示了英雄。

trans-unit.source: Previously, when navigating from the HeroListComponent to the HeroDetailComponent, you subscribed to the route parameter map Observable and made it available to the HeroDetailComponent in the ActivatedRoute service. You injected that service in the constructor of the HeroDetailComponent.
trans-unit.target: 此前，从航行时 HeroListComponent 到 HeroDetailComponent ，您开通的路线参数图 Observable 并使其提供给 HeroDetailComponent 在 ActivatedRoute 服务。您将该服务注入了 HeroDetailComponent 的构造函数中。

trans-unit.source: Previously, when you wanted to add a component to an app at runtime, you had to define a dynamic component. The app module would have to list your dynamic component under entryComponents, so that the app wouldn't expect it to be present at startup, and then you would have to load it, attach it to an element in the DOM, and wire up all of the dependencies, change detection, and event handling, as described in Dynamic Component Loader.
trans-unit.target: 以前，当您想在运行时将组件添加到应用程序时，必须定义一个动态组件。应用程序模块将必须在 entryComponents 下列出您的动态组件，这样应用程序就不会期望它在启动时出现，然后您就必须加载它，将其附加到DOM中的元素，然后连接所有依赖项，更改检测和事件处理，如Dynamic Component Loader中所述。

trans-unit.source: Promise
trans-unit.target: Promise

trans-unit.source: Promises are not cancellable.
trans-unit.target: 承诺是不可取消的。

trans-unit.source: Promises do not differentiate between the last .then clauses (equivalent to subscription) and intermediate .then clauses (equivalent to map).
trans-unit.target: 承诺不区分last .then 子句（等同于订阅）和中间 .then 子句（等同于map）。

trans-unit.source: Promises execute immediately, and just once. The computation of the result is initiated when the promise is created. There is no way to restart work. All then clauses (subscriptions) share the same computation.
trans-unit.target: 承诺立即执行，并且仅执行一次。创建承诺后，将开始计算结果。无法重新开始工作。 then 所有的子句（订阅）共享相同的计算。

trans-unit.source: Promises push errors to the child promises.
trans-unit.target: 承诺将错误推送给子承诺。

trans-unit.target: 不存在的属性采用HammerJS默认值。有关哪些事件支持哪些属性以及它们的允许值和默认值的信息，请参见HammerJS文档。

trans-unit.source: Providers

trans-unit.source: Providers can also be scoped by injector through constructor parameter decorators. The following example overrides the BROWSER_STORAGE token in the Component class providers with the sessionStorage browser API. The same BrowserStorageService is injected twice in the constructor, decorated with @Self and @SkipSelf to define which injector handles the provider dependency.
trans-unit.target: 注入程序也可以通过构造函数参数修饰符来对提供程序进行范围划分。以下示例使用 sessionStorage 浏览器API 覆盖 Component 类 providers 的 BROWSER_STORAGE 令牌。同样 BrowserStorageService 在构造函数中注射两次，装饰 @Self 自我和 @SkipSelf SkipSelf定义哪些喷油器手柄供应商的依赖。

trans-unit.source: Providers listed in the @NgModule.providers of a bootstrapped module have application scope. Adding a service provider to @NgModule.providers effectively publishes the service to the entire application.
trans-unit.target: 自举模块的 @NgModule.providers 中列出的提供程序具有应用程序范围。将服务提供者添加到 @NgModule.providers 有效地将服务发布到整个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Providers should be configured using @Injectable syntax. If possible, they should be provided in the application root (providedIn: 'root'). Services that are configured this way are lazily loaded if they are only used from a lazily loaded context.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序应使用 @Injectable 语法进行配置。如果可能，应在应用程序根目录中 providedIn: 'root' 它们（providerIn：'root'）。如果仅从延迟加载的上下文中使用以这种方式配置的服务，则将延迟加载它们。

trans-unit.source: Provides npm packages to the entire workspace. Workspace-wide node_modules dependencies are visible to all projects.
trans-unit.target: 为整个工作区提供npm软件包。工作区范围内的 node_modules 依赖关系对所有项目都是可见的。

trans-unit.source: Reactive
trans-unit.target: Reactive

trans-unit.source: Reactive Forms
trans-unit.target: 反应式

trans-unit.source: Reactive Forms Guide
trans-unit.target: 反应式表格指南

trans-unit.source: Reactive and template-driven forms both use a form model to track value changes between Angular forms and form input elements. The examples below show how the form model is defined and created.
trans-unit.target: 反应式表单和模板驱动表单都使用表单模型来跟踪Angular表单和表单输入元素之间的值变化。下面的例子展示了表单模型是如何定义和创建的。

trans-unit.source: Reactive and template-driven forms process and manage form data differently. Each offers different advantages.
trans-unit.target: 反应式和模板驱动的表单以不同的方式处理和管理表单数据。两者都有不同的优势。

trans-unit.source: Reactive form validation
trans-unit.target: 反应式表单验证

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms
trans-unit.target: 反应式

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms API
trans-unit.target: 反应式表单API

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms also provide a straightforward path to testing because you are assured that your data is consistent and predictable when requested. Any consumers of the streams have access to manipulate that data safely.
trans-unit.target: 反应式表单还提供了一个直接的测试路径,因为你可以保证你的数据在请求时是一致的、可预测的。流的任何消费者都可以安全地访问操作这些数据。

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms belongs to a different NgModule called ReactiveFormsModule, so in order to access any reactive forms directives, you have to import ReactiveFormsModule from the @angular/forms library.
trans-unit.target: 反应形式属于 NgModule 称为 ReactiveFormsModule 的NgModule，因此，为了访问任何反应形式指令，您必须从 @angular/forms 库导入 ReactiveFormsModule 。

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms differ from template-driven forms in distinct ways. Reactive forms provide more predictability with synchronous access to the data model, immutability with observable operators, and change tracking through observable streams. If you prefer direct access to modify data in your template, template-driven forms are less explicit because they rely on directives embedded in the template, along with mutable data to track changes asynchronously. See the Forms Overview for detailed comparisons between the two paradigms.
trans-unit.target: 反应形式与模板驱动形式不同。反应性表单通过对数据模型的同步访问提供了更多的可预测性，通过可观察的运算符实现了不变性，并且通过可观察的流进行了更改跟踪。如果您希望直接访问来修改模板中的数据，则模板驱动的表单不太明确，因为它们依赖于模板中嵌入的指令以及可变数据来异步跟踪更改。有关这两种范例的详细比较，请参见表单概述。

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms give you access to the form control state and value at a point in time. You can manipulate the current state and value through the component class or the component template. The following examples display the value of the form control instance and change it.
trans-unit.target: 反应式表单让您可以在某个时间点访问表单控件的状态和值。你可以通过组件类或组件模板来操作当前的状态和值。下面的例子显示窗体控件实例的值并改变它。

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms have methods to change a control's value programmatically, which gives you the flexibility to update the value without user interaction. A form control instance provides a setValue() method that updates the value of the form control and validates the structure of the value provided against the control's structure. For example, when retrieving form data from a backend API or service, use the setValue() method to update the control to its new value, replacing the old value entirely.
trans-unit.target: 反应形式具有通过编程方式更改控件值的方法，这使您可以灵活地更新值而无需用户干预。表单控件实例提供了 setValue() 方法，该方法将更新表单控件的值并根据控件的结构验证所提供的值的结构。例如，当从后端API或服务中检索表单数据时，请使用 setValue() 方法将控件更新为新值，从而完全替换旧值。

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms have properties that use observables to monitor form control values. The FormControl properties valueChanges and statusChanges contain observables that raise change events. Subscribing to an observable form-control property is a way of triggering application logic within the component class. For example:
trans-unit.target: 反应性表单具有使用可观察对象监视表单控制值的属性。该 FormControl 性质 valueChanges 和 statusChanges 实例包含观测加薪变化事件。订阅可观察的表单控件属性是一种在组件类中触发应用程序逻辑的方法。例如：

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms include a set of validator functions for common use cases. These functions receive a control to validate against and return an error object or a null value based on the validation check.
trans-unit.target: 反应式表单包括一组用于常见用例的验证器函数。这些函数接收一个控件来进行验证,并根据验证检查返回一个错误对象或一个空值。

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms provide a relatively easy testing strategy because they provide synchronous access to the form and data models, and they can be tested without rendering the UI. In these tests, status and data are queried and manipulated through the control without interacting with the change detection cycle.
trans-unit.target: 反应式表单提供了一种相对简单的测试策略,因为它们提供了对表单和数据模型的同步访问,并且可以在不渲染UI的情况下进行测试。在这些测试中,状态和数据通过控件进行查询和操作,而不与变更检测周期进行交互。

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms provide access to information about a given control through properties and methods provided with each instance. These properties and methods of the underlying AbstractControl class are used to control form state and determine when to display messages when handling validation. For more information, see Simple form validation later in this guide.
trans-unit.target: 反应形式通过每个实例提供的属性和方法提供对给定控件的信息的访问。基础AbstractControl类的这些属性和方法用于控制表单状态并确定在处理验证时何时显示消息。有关更多信息，请参阅本指南后面的“ 简单表单验证”。

trans-unit.source: Reactive forms use an explicit and immutable approach to managing the state of a form at a given point in time. Each change to the form state returns a new state, which maintains the integrity of the model between changes. Reactive forms are built around observable streams, where form inputs and values are provided as streams of input values, which can be accessed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 反应式表单使用一种显式和不可变的方法来管理表单在给定时间点的状态。对表单状态的每一次改变都会返回一个新的状态,这在改变之间保持了模型的完整性。反应式表单是围绕可观察流构建的,表单输入和值以输入值流的形式提供,可以同步访问。

trans-unit.source: Reactive programming is an asynchronous programming paradigm concerned with data streams and the propagation of change (Wikipedia). RxJS (Reactive Extensions for JavaScript) is a library for reactive programming using observables that makes it easier to compose asynchronous or callback-based code. See (RxJS Docs).
trans-unit.target: 响应式编程是一种异步编程范例，它涉及数据流和更改的传播（维基百科）。RxJS（JavaScript的响应式扩展）是用于使用可观察对象进行响应式编程的库，可简化编写异步或基于回调的代码的过程。请参阅（RxJS Docs）。

trans-unit.source: Register a provider with a component when you must limit a service instance to a component and its component tree, that is, its child components. For example, a user editing component, UserEditorComponent, that needs a private copy of a caching UserService should register the UserService with the UserEditorComponent. Then each new instance of the UserEditorComponent gets its own cached service instance.
trans-unit.target: 当您必须将服务实例限制为组件及其组件树（即其子组件）时，请向该组件注册提供程序。例如，需要缓存 UserService 的私有副本的用户编辑组件 UserEditorComponent 应该向 UserEditorComponent 注册 UserService 。然后， UserEditorComponent 的每个新实例都会获得其自己的缓存服务实例。

trans-unit.source: Register a service in AppComponent providers only if the service must be hidden from components outside the AppComponent tree. This is a rare use case.

trans-unit.source: Relying on direct DOM access creates tight coupling between your application and rendering layers which will make it impossible to separate the two and deploy your application into a web worker.
trans-unit.target: 依靠直接的DOM访问会在你的应用程序和渲染层之间产生紧密的耦合,这将使你无法将两者分开,并将你的应用程序部署到一个web worker中。

trans-unit.source: Remember also that a directive's data-bound input properties are not set until after construction. That's a problem if you need to initialize the directive based on those properties. They'll have been set when ngOnInit() runs.
trans-unit.target: 还要记住，指令的数据绑定输入属性只有在构建之后才设置。如果您需要基于这些属性初始化指令，那将是一个问题。它们将在 ngOnInit() 运行时设置。

To change the default setting for all components in your application, set the preserveWhitespaces option of the AOT compiler.

trans-unit.source: Reports whether the control is dirty, meaning that the user has changed the value in the UI. If the control is not present, null is returned.

trans-unit.source: Reports whether the control is disabled, meaning that the control is disabled in the UI and is exempt from validation checks and excluded from aggregate values of ancestor controls. If the control is not present, null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 报告该控件是否被禁用,也就是说,该控件在UI中被禁用,并且不需要进行验证检查,也不包括在祖先控件的集合值中。如果该控件不存在,则返回null。

trans-unit.source: Reports whether the control is enabled, meaning that the control is included in ancestor calculations of validity or value. If the control is not present, null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 报告该控件是否被启用,这意味着该控件被包含在祖先计算的有效性或价值中。如果该控件不存在,则返回null。

trans-unit.source: Reports whether the control is invalid, meaning that an error exists in the input value. If the control is not present, null is returned.

trans-unit.source: Reports whether the control is pristine, meaning that the user has not yet changed the value in the UI. If the control is not present, null is returned.

trans-unit.source: Reports whether the control is touched, meaning that the user has triggered a blur event on it. If the control is not present, null is returned.

trans-unit.source: Routed components are also entry components because they need to be loaded dynamically. The router creates them and drops them into the DOM near a <router-outlet>.

trans-unit.source: Routed feature modules are domain feature modules whose top components are the targets of router navigation routes.
trans-unit.target: 路由功能模块是域功能模块,其顶部组件是路由器导航路由的目标。

trans-unit.source: Routed feature modules don’t export anything because their components never appear in the template of an external component.
trans-unit.target: 路由功能模块不会导出任何内容，因为它们的组件永远不会出现在外部组件的模板中。

trans-unit.source: Routed feature modules rarely have providers for reasons explained in Lazy Loading Feature Modules. When they do, the lifetime of the provided services should be the same as the lifetime of the module. Don't provide application-wide singleton services in a routed feature module or in a module that the routed module imports.
trans-unit.target: 路由功能模块很少具有提供程序，这是由于延迟加载功能模块中所述的原因。当它们这样做时，所提供服务的生存期应与模块的生存期相同。不要在路由功能模块或路由模块导入的模块中提供应用程序范围内的单例服务。

trans-unit.source: Routing component

trans-unit.source: Routing enables users to navigate between different routes in an application. When a user navigates from one route to another, the Angular router maps the URL path to a relevant component and displays its view. Animating this route transition can greatly enhance the user experience.
trans-unit.target: 路由器使用户能够在应用程序中的不同路线之间进行导航。当用户从一个路由导航到另一个路由时,Angular 路由器会将 URL 路径映射到相关组件并显示其视图。对这种路由过渡进行动画处理,可以极大地提升用户体验。

trans-unit.source: Routing is handled differently in Angular.
trans-unit.target: Angular中的路由处理方式不同。

trans-unit.source: Routing is pretty complicated. Testing the DashboardComponent seemed daunting in part because it involves the Router, which it injects together with the HeroService.

trans-unit.source: Routing makes more sense when there are multiple views. So far there's only the heroes view.

trans-unit.source: Rule of One
trans-unit.target: 一条规则

trans-unit.source: Rules are used in BUILD.bazel files, which are markers for the packages in your workspace. Each BUILD.bazel file declares a separate package to Bazel, though you can have more coarse-grained distributions so that the packages you publish (for example, to npm) can be made up of many Bazel packages.
trans-unit.target: 在 BUILD.bazel 文件中使用规则，这些文件是您工作区中软件包的标记。每个 BUILD.bazel 文件都向Bazel声明了一个单独的程序包，尽管您可以拥有更粗粒度的分发，以便您发布的程序包（例如，发布到 npm ）可以由许多Bazel程序包组成。

trans-unit.source: Rules can collect option values from the caller and inject them into templates. The options available to your rules, with their allowed values and defaults, are defined in the schematic's JSON schema file, <schematic>/schema.json. You can define variable or enumerated data types for the schema using TypeScript interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 规则可以从调用方收集选项值，并将它们注入模板中。规则可用的选项及其允许的值和默认值在逻辑示意图的JSON模式文件 <schematic>/schema.json 中定义。您可以使用TypeScript接口为架构定义变量或枚举数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Rules can make use of utilities provided with the @schematics/angular package. Look for helper functions for working with modules, dependencies, TypeScript, AST, JSON, Angular CLI workspaces and projects, and more.
trans-unit.target: 规则可以使用 @schematics/angular 软件包提供的实用程序。寻找用于处理模块，依赖项，TypeScript，AST，JSON，Angular CLI工作区和项目等的辅助函数。

trans-unit.source: SchemaMetadata

trans-unit.source: Schematic prompts introduce user interaction into schematic execution. You can configure schematic options to display a customizable question to the user. The prompts are displayed before the execution of the schematic, which then uses the response as the value for the option. This allows users to direct the operation of the schematic without requiring in-depth knowledge of the full spectrum of available options.
trans-unit.target: 原理图提示将用户交互引入到原理图执行中。您可以配置逻辑示意图选项，以向用户显示可自定义的问题。在执行原理图之前会显示提示，然后该原理图将响应用作选项的值。这使用户可以指导原理图的操作，而无需深入了解可用选项的全部范围。

trans-unit.source: Schematics CLI

trans-unit.source: Schematics are part of the Angular ecosystem. The Angular CLI uses schematics to apply transforms to a web-app project. You can modify these schematics, and define new ones to do things like update your code to fix breaking changes in a dependency, for example, or to add a new configuration option or framework to an existing project.
trans-unit.target: 原理图是Angular生态系统的一部分。该角CLI使用图表来变换应用到网络应用项目。您可以修改这些原理图，并定义新的原理图，以执行诸如更新代码以修复依赖项中的重大更改之类的事情，或者为现有项目添加新的配置选项或框架。

trans-unit.source: Schematics come with their own command-line tool. Using Node 6.9 or above, install the Schematics CLI globally:

trans-unit.source: Schematics that are included in the @schematics/angular collection are run by default by the commands ng generate and ng add. The package contains named schematics that configure the options that are available to the CLI for ng generate sub-commands, such as ng generate component and ng generate service. The subcommands for ng generate are shorthand for the corresponding schematic. You can specify a particular schematic (or collection of schematics) to generate, using the long form:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， @schematics/angular 集合中包含的原理图由 ng generate 和 ng add 命令运行。该软件包包含命名的示意图，这些示意图配置了CLI可以用于 ng generate 子命令的选项，例如 ng generate component 和 ng generate service 。 ng generate 的子命令是相应原理图的简写。您可以使用长格式指定要生成的特定原理图（或原理图集合）：

trans-unit.source: Scopes must be strictly nested and are analogous to stack frames, but do not have to follow the stack frames. Instead it is recommended that they follow logical nesting. You may want to use Event Signatures as they are defined in WTF.
trans-unit.target: 范围必须严格嵌套且类似于堆栈框架，但不必遵循堆栈框架。相反，建议它们遵循逻辑嵌套。您可能要使用在WTF中定义的事件签名。

trans-unit.source: Serializes and deserializes a URL string into a URL tree.
trans-unit.target: 将一个URL字符串序列化和反序列化为一个URL树。

trans-unit.source: Serializes and parses URL parameter keys and values to encode and decode them. If you pass URL query parameters without encoding, the query parameters can be misinterpreted at the receiving end.
trans-unit.target: 序列化和解析URL参数键和值,对其进行编码和解码。如果你传递的URL查询参数没有进行编码,查询参数可能会在接收端被误解。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the body to an encoded string, where key-value pairs (separated by =) are separated by &s.
trans-unit.target: 将主体序列化为编码字符串，其中键值对（用 = 分隔）用 & s 分隔。

trans-unit.source: Service feature modules.

trans-unit.source: Service modules provide utility services such as data access and messaging. Ideally, they consist entirely of providers and have no declarations. Angular's HttpClientModule is a good example of a service module.
trans-unit.target: 服务模块提供实用程序服务，例如数据访问和消息传递。理想情况下，它们完全由提供者组成，没有声明。Angular的 HttpClientModule 是服务模块的一个很好的例子。
